gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render

Class BasicFrameRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.FrameRenderer
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.BasicFrameRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer, Transformer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvertedFrameRenderer, MapRenderer, MatrixRenderer

    public class BasicFrameRenderer
extends FrameRenderer

    Frame renderer with list of renderers to process internal frame areas

    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
